languages.text: "Истина в том, что свет Императора свят, а всякий, кто противится ему — мерзок и порочен".
"The truth is that the Emperor's light is sacred, and any who defy it are wicked and profane."
languages.original_text: "Истина в том, что свет Императора свят, а всякий, кто противится ему — мерзок и порочен".

traits.locale_text: "The truth is that the Emperor's light is sacred, and any who defy it are wicked and sinful."
"The truth is that the Emperor's light is sacred, and any who defy it are wicked and sinful."
"The truth is that the Emperor's light is sacred, and any who defy it are wicked and sinful."
"The truth is that the Emperor's light is sacred, and any who defy it are wicked and sinful."
"The truth is that the Emperor's light is sacred, and any who defy it are wicked and profane."

languages.text: “真理就是，帝皇的光芒是神圣的。任何藐视它的人，都是邪恶的罪人。”
languages.original_text: "The truth is that the Emperor's light is sacred, and any who defy it are wicked and profane."

traits.locale_text: “真理就是，帝皇的光芒是神圣的。任何藐视它的人，都是邪恶的罪人。”

languages.text: «Lo cierto es que la luz del Emperador es sagrada, y todo aquel que ose oponerse a ella es malvado y profano».
languages.original_text: "The truth is that the Emperor's light is sacred, and any who defy it are wicked and profane."

traits.locale_text: «Lo cierto es que la luz del Emperador es sagrada, y todo aquel que ose oponerse a ella es malvado y pecador».

languages.text: 「皇帝陛下の御光は神聖であり、これに逆らうものは邪悪で冒涜的であると知りなさい」
languages.original_text: "The truth is that the Emperor's light is sacred, and any who defy it are wicked and profane."

traits.locale_text: 「皇帝陛下の御光は神聖であり、これに逆らうものは邪悪で罪深いものであると知りなさい」

languages.text: "Die Wahrheit lautet, dass das Licht des Imperators heilig ist, und wer das leugnet, ist böse und sündhaft."
languages.original_text: "The truth is that the Emperor's light is sacred, and any who defy it are wicked and profane."

traits.locale_text: "Die Wahrheit lautet, dass das Licht des Imperators heilig ist, und wer das leugnet, ist böse und sündig."

languages.text: « La vérité, c'est que la lumière de l'Empereur est sacrée, et qu'il faut être malveillant et impie pour la défier. »
languages.original_text: "The truth is that the Emperor's light is sacred, and any who defy it are wicked and profane."

traits.locale_text: « La vérité, c'est que la lumière de l'Empereur est sacrée, et qu'il faut être malveillant et impur pour la défier. »

languages.text: "Gerçek, İmparator'un ışığının kutsallığıdır. Bunu reddeden her kimse ahlaksız ve dinsizdir."
languages.original_text: "The truth is that the Emperor's light is sacred, and any who defy it are wicked and profane."

traits.locale_text: "İmparator'un ışığının kutsal olduğu gerçektir ve bunu reddeden her kimse ahlaksızdır ve dinsizdir."
